title: MYB
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Netflix’s ‘The Electric State’ Should Raise Concerns At Marvel
items.description: While Netflix original movies do not have to be critical hits to be successes, The Electric State is shaping up to be a disaster for the service.

items.title: Apple Watch SE 2025: Striking New Design May Never Happen
items.description: A new report suggests that one of the most intriguing aspects of a new Apple Watch SE may not happen after all. Here’s what it all means.

items.title: Twelve South Unveils New AirFly Pro 2 Bluetooth Accessory Compatible With AirPods
items.description: The latest gizmo from TwelveSouth promises better audio quality and more features.

items.title: Helping You With Stress
items.description: How we respond to stress depends on the situation and differences in our biology.
